class pymt.ui.window.MTDisplay(**kwargs)¶

MTDisplay is a widget that draw a circle under every touch on window

Parameters:

Color of circle under finger

radius : int

Radius of circle under finger in pixel

class pymt.ui.window.MTWindow(**kwargs)¶

MTWindow is a window widget who use MTSimulator for generating touch event with mouse. Use MTWindow as main window application.

Parameters:
color : list

Background color of window

view : MTWidget

Default view to add on window

fullscreen : bool

Make window as fullscreen

config : Config

Default configuration to pass on TouchWindow
